title: How to Play GIFs on PC or Mac

steps.title: Navigate to the GIF on your computer.
steps.content: Navigate to the GIF on your computer. If you downloaded the GIF from the internet you'll typically find it in your Downloads folder.

steps.title: Right-click the GIF you want to view.
steps.content: Right-click the GIF you want to view. [1] X Expert Source Mitch Harris Consumer Technology Expert Expert Interview. 31 August 31 2021. A context menu will expand.

steps.title: Hover over Open with on the right-click menu.
steps.content: Hover over Open with on the right-click menu. [2] X Expert Source Mitch Harris Consumer Technology Expert Expert Interview. 31 August 31 2021. This will open a list of recommended applications on a sub-menu.

steps.title: Click your web browser.
steps.content: Click your web browser. [3] X Expert Source Mitch Harris Consumer Technology Expert Expert Interview. 31 August 31 2021. Some popular browsers are Safari , Edge , Chrome , and Firefox . This will play the GIF in your browser. If you don't see your browser on the "Open with" menu, click Choose another app or Other at the bottom. This will open a list of all the apps on your computer. Alternatively, you can select Windows Media Player to open and play a GIF on a Windows PC.
